body_html: Re-install / re-flash using JetPack 2.3 because the latest release also updated to Ubuntu 16.04 aarch64 in addition to CUDA 8 and L4T R24.2. The underlying CUDA version is tied to the L4T BSP in JetPack.
body_text: Re-install / re-flash using JetPack 2.3 because the latest release also updated to Ubuntu 16.04 aarch64 in addition to CUDA 8 and L4T R24.2.   The underlying CUDA version is tied to the L4T BSP in JetPack.
body: Re-install / re-flash using [JetPack 2.3](https://developer.nvidia.com/embedded/jetpack) because the latest release also updated to Ubuntu 16.04 aarch64 in addition to CUDA 8 and L4T R24.2.   The underlying CUDA version is tied to the L4T BSP in JetPack.
